title: What is this typeface
content:
Hi,  
I saw this on a Blog [www.byfk8644.blogspt.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018053305/http:/www.byfk8644.blogspt.com/ "www.byfk8644.blogspt.com")

And i was struggling to ID it.  
Any suggestions?  
Thanks  
Joel

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [business-models.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018053305/http:/typophile.com/files/business-models.jpg) | 62.35 KB |
author: joel stephens

comments.content:
Just about to say Bodoni myself :)

It's hard to find this Bodoni though. Looks very pretty in subheadings.

Any idea which one this is?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018053305im_/http:/typophile.com/files/fort_worth_museum_logo_detail_3534.gif)

[Bauer Bodoni – hard to find?](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018053305/http:/new.myfonts.com/search/Bauer+Bodoni/fonts/)

That’s [Gotham](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018053305/http:/www.typography.com/fonts/font_overview.php?productLineID=100008).

Please start a new thread next time.

Thanks Jan. Will try Gotham to see if that's the one.

I have 30 Bauer Bodonis, but it's hard to get the sharpness of the text that the original poster showed in his example.

Cheers
